int LRW_AES_ctx_decrypt (  uint8_t *    cin,
uint32_t    clen,
uint8_t *    out,
lrw_aes_ctx_t *    lrw_ctx
) 
 

LRW AES Decryption (Multiple calls for same key) This decrypts Ciphered input.

Parameters:
cin  pointer to Ciphered input of size "clen" bytes (Input)
clen  Length of the Ciphered input in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Plain output of size "clen" bytes (Output)
lrw_ctx  pointer to lrw_aes_ctx_t structure. This is an opaque pointer to the user (Input)
Returns:
LRW_AES_SUCCESS (0) LRW_AES_INVALID_CTX (-2) LRW_AES_INVALID_LENGTH (-3)

int LRW_AES_ctx_encrypt (  uint8_t *    pin,
uint32_t    plen,
uint8_t *    out,
lrw_aes_ctx_t *    lrw_ctx
) 
 

LRW AES Encryption (Multiple calls for same key) This encrypts plain input.

Parameters:
pin  pointer to Plain input of size "plen" bytes (Input)
plen  Length of the Plain input in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Ciphered output of size "plen" bytes (Output)
lrw_ctx  pointer to lrw_aes_ctx_t structure. This is an opaque pointer to the user (Input)
Returns:
LRW_AES_SUCCESS (0) LRW_AES_INVALID_CTX (-2) LRW_AES_INVALID_LENGTH (-3)

uint8_t *    out

LRW AES Decryption This decrypts Ciphered input.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits (Input)
cin  pointer to Ciphered input of size "clen" bytes (Input)
clen  Length of the Ciphered input in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Plain output of size "clen" bytes (Output)
Returns:
LRW_AES_SUCCESS (0) LRW_AES_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1) LRW_AES_INVALID_CTX (-2) LRW_AES_INVALID_LENGTH (-3)

uint32_t    keylen,
uint8_t *    p,
uint32_t    plen,
uint8_t *    tweak,
uint8_t *    out
) 
 

LRW AES Encryption This encrypts plain input.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits (Input)
i  Pointer to 16 byte Initial tweak value (Input)
pin  pointer to Plain input of size "plen" bytes (Input)
plen  Length of the Plain input in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Ciphered output of size "plen" bytes (Output)
Returns:
LRW_AES_SUCCESS (0) LRW_AES_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1) LRW_AES_INVALID_CTX (-2) LRW_AES_INVALID_LENGTH (-3)

int LRW_AES_set_key (  uint8_t *    key,
uint32_t    keylen,
uint8_t *    i,
lrw_aes_ctx_t *    lrw_ctx
) 
 

LRW AES Sets the key in the context.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits(Valid values: 256,320,384)(Input)
i  Pointer to 16 byte Initial tweak value (Input)
lrw_ctx  pointer to lrw_aes_ctx_t structure. This is an opaque pointer to the user (Input)
Returns:
LRW_AES_SUCCESS (0) LRW_AES_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1)
